description:
The last year of high school is always a time of both looking forward and looking back. Before you lives the future, alternately bright and scary. Behind you lie memories, both happy and sad. And somehow, in the course of one year, you have to reconcile those two and decide where your life is going to go.

For Wakana Sakai, who had started studying music, it's time to face the tragedy that made her abandon that path. For Sawa Okita, it's about her dreams of riding professionally. And for Konatsu Miyamoto, it's about bringing her friends together through the magic of a song. Can something as simple as the formation of a choir club really help solve the hurts and pangs that come with growing up? Can music bring people together despite their differences?

(Source: Sentai Filmworks)

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Coastal
tags.description: Story prominently takes place near the beach or around a coastal area/town. Setting is near the ocean.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Animals
tags.description: Prominently features animal characters in a leading role.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.
